command: reply=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w %{http_code} -o /dev/null -k -H "Content-Type: application/json"  https://127.0.0.1:9443/appconfig-defaulter); if [ \"$reply\" -lt 200 -o \"$reply\" -ge 400 ]; then exit 1; fi; reply=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w %{http_code} -o /dev/null -k -H "Content-Type: application/json"  https://127.0.0.1:9443/validate-oam-verrazzano-io-v1alpha1-ingresstrait); if [ \"$reply\" -lt 200 -o \"$reply\" -ge 400 ]; then exit 1; fi;
